description: metal brown book-shaped bank with a light cardboard separate sheath; door in the top of book conceals a green plastic hand which snatches coins; key and lever on side; hatch on back
inscription:
Inscriptions

on back of sheath, at bottom, in brown: [(c) / 1968 / FRANKONIA PRODUCTS INC.]; on side bottom, in brown: [PAT. 023180 / #-6471 MADE IN JAPAN]; top of sheath, in pencil: [69/1000]
title: "How to Get Wealthy" (book) mechanical bank
